SiteNameAddress: Car Park, Pytchley Court, Corby, NN17 2PL
PlanningHistory: Previously proposed as a Housing Allocation (HA21) for 13 dwellings in the Proposed Site Specific Allocations Development Plan Document as consulted upon by Corby Borough Council in September 2009 (Saved Local Plan Policy R2).

SiteNameAddress: Garage Court, Lindisfarne Road, Corby, NN17 2HW
SiteInformation: Majority of site is in public sector ownership but the remaining garages are private. Site considered in mutiple ownership as a result.

SiteNameAddress: Maple House, Canada Square, Corby, NN18 9HU
PlanningHistory: Pre-application discussions held previously by the owners and council held with a view to bringing site forward for Housing use. No planning application at November 2017.
SiteInformation: A Tree Preservation Order existis on site (TPO/2014/5)

SiteNameAddress: Former Our Lady Pope John School, Tower Hill Road, Corby, NN18 0TF
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: Outline application for demolition of the existing school buildings and redevelopment of site to provide 95 residential dwellings, together with parking, access roads, communal square, children's playground, utility services and other associated works.
Notes: No start on site at November 2017.

SiteNameAddress: Railway Station Interchange, Station Road, Corby, NN17 1NA
PlanningHistory: Site was previously subject to a Starter Homes bid to the HCA.
Notes:
Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 2030.

The site has been subject to a bid to the HCA for Starter Homes funding and it was assumed that 40 dwellings could be delivered on the site. However, as part of an urban design review, consideration was also made of a mix of uses being deployed on site which reduces the developable area for housing (assuming 50dph)an alternative yield of 29 dwellings has been assumed.

SiteNameAddress: Beanfield School, off Glastonbury Road, Corby, NN18 0DJ
DevelopmentDescription: Outline application for up to 96 dwellings with associated access, open space, play area and landscaping
Notes: Site is under construction at November 2017 pursuant to extant permission (no completions to date).

SiteNameAddress: Parkland Gateway, George Street, Corby, NN17 1QG
Notes:
Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 2037.

The site was previously been subject to a bid to the HCA for Starter Homes funding and it was assumed that 40 dwellings could be delivered on the site. However, as part of an urban design review, consideration was also made of higher densities (flats) being deployed on site and assuming 100dph an alternative yield of 63 dwellings has been assumed.

SiteNameAddress: Kingswood School, Gainsborough Road, Corby, NN18 9NQ
DevelopmentDescription: Demolition of existing buildings and development of up to 90 dwellings with associated access, open space, play area and landscaping
Notes: Site is under construction at November 2017 pursuant to extant permission (12 dwellings completed to date, 10 starts).
